emuInput.TitMainTitle: Group portrait of two women wearing one piece bathing suits with floral fronts and dark backs, six men seated on either side, posed on low diving board of Ammon recreation center swimming pool
emuInput.CatDescriptText: Cutline for related images published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, August 3, 1946, reads: - Participants in colorful Water Circus at Ammon Center pool Friday, Aug. 9. The Circus will be one of the feature events of Frogs Week Celebration.  The spectacular show will include all types of stunts, ballet dancing and thrilling diving.  The Bureau of Recreation is joining with the Frogs in sponsoring the Circus which promises to be as sensational as anything of its kind ever presented here.
